title: ranked team looking for mid lane and adc for ranked 5's
body:
We have already finished placements and were put in s5...we are looking for players to fill in several spots as some of our members have quit. if you would like to join please put 

IGN:
RANK:
VOICE CHAT:
MAIN ROLE (and any others you can play well)
MAIN CHAMPS: 
SOMETHING ABOUT YOURSELF:

feel free to add me in game AntarcticIkeelu

also please be at least silver to join...we won accept any lower

replies.body:

MAIN ROLE (and any others you can play well) Mid, Top, Jg
MAIN CHAMPS:{{champion:63}} {{champion:90}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:19}} 
SOMETHING ABOUT YOURSELF: Ive been looking for a serious team for a while i want to rank up!

Willing to be Sub
ok our team is set but keep an eye out for us as well do still have a few spaces left on the roster

(Mid favors {{champion:61}} /{{champion:126}}  + ADC favors {{champion:22}} /{{champion:110}} )
SOMETHING ABOUT YOURSELF: I favor a more disengage and zone control style in any role. Always looking to improve.

IGN:A Kitty Kat

SOMETHING ABOUT YOURSELF:With 100 ranked games of Katarina i keep a 10-5-10 KDA and a 55% win rate.

I'm 24, I like to Shot call, and between all of my accounts I keep a very high win ratio: http://na.op.gg/summoner/champions/userName=Rito%20Wants%20Teh%20D (~70%)
